HOME_CAROUSEL_1P: Leading retailers use Purecomm to deliver an omni-channel customer experience across Asia Pacific.
HOME_CAROUSEL_2P: Purecomm solutions bring digital teams and traditional retail teams together; collaborating to deliver a better customer experience.
HOME_CAROUSEL_3P: Purecomm solutions take just minutes to master, but guide a sophisticated workflow that delivers a flawless customer experience.
HOME_BENEFITS_1P: Drive full-price sell-tgrough by offering every product through every channel.
HOME_BENEFITS_2P: Boost online conversation by offering more convenient delivery options.
HOME_BENEFITS_2P-2: Drive loyalty and repeat purchase by consistently delivering on promise.
HOME_SOLUTIONS_BODY: Purecomm provides simple tools for store staff to facilitate collection and return of online purchases in the store; and sophisticate fulfilment workflow for both ship-from-store and high-volume distribution centres. The customer care team have a birds-eye view of everything that's happening, so they can serve the customer with confidence.
HOME_MAP_BODY: From Sydney to Seoul and from Bangkok to Beijing, Purecomm connects local retail stores to online stores. In every corner of Asia, we work in local language, accept local payment, ship from local 3PLs with local couriers and calculate local taxes; delivering best-practice in a way that works.
